title: Object Oriented Programming in Go
description: Someone asked a question on the forum today on how to gain the benefits of inheritance without embedding. It is really important for everyone to think in terms of Go and not the languages they are leaving behind. I can’t tell you much code I removed from my early Go implementations because it wasn’t necessary. The language designers have years of experience and knowledge. Hindsight is helping to create a language that is fast, lean and really fun to code in.
